Text:
Please please seed at least until someone is able to do so, we're all leeching sadly!
Thanks for uploading such an important documentary

Will seed now that I know someone cares, totomded! Please circulate as widely as you can.

Here are some refs on the disastrous death of Juliano Mer Khamis:

http://www.haaretz.com/print-edition/opinion/mer-khamis-and-binational-resistance-movement-1.354358

http://972mag.com/breaking-activist-actor-director-juliiano-mer-khamis-assassinated/

http://electronicintifada.net/v2/article11897.shtml?utm_source=feedburner&utm_medium=feed&utm_campaign=Feed:+electronicIntifadaPalestine+%28Electronic+Intifada+:+Palestine+News%29

http://www.democracynow.org/2011/4/5/leading_palestinian_peace_activist_theater_director

http://www.haaretz.com/culture/mideast-can-t-bear-bridge-building-figures-like-juliano-mer-khamis-1.354184

Am trying to seed now but my connection is apparently so bad I don't even count as a seeder. Current UL speed: around 2 kb/sec. But in total I have uploaded 3.7 GB of it though... Are you getting the file or doesn't it work? If not, lemme know and I'll try to set up a new torrent (and in the meantime do order the film from the official website..!)

RESPECT: Please pay due respects to the late director Mer Khamis and The Freedom Theatre by sending the theatre an appropriate donation for your downloading/watching the movie.

There are various ways to support the project:
http://www.thefreedomtheatre.org/support.php
